metadata.title: CVE-2022-37769 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libjpeg commit 281daa9 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault viaHuffmanDecoder::Get at huffmandecoder.hpp. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
